title: A consultant who called the AI software collapse almost a year ago says no part of the business will escape 'unscathed'
full_text: A consultant who called the AI software collapse almost a year ago says no part of the business will escape 'unscathed'. Michelle Miller at AlixPartners discusses AI's pressure on software stocks, urging companies to adapt to major industry changes.. Michelle Miller, Co-Head of the Enterprise Software Technology group at AlixPartnersAlixPartners <ul><li>Michelle Miller and her colleagues at AlixPartners warned of trouble brewing back in April.</… [+5504 chars]
